html: (2 Nephi 8:10)."Art thou not he who hath dried the sea [and] made the depths of the sea a way for the ransomed to pass over?" This reference is to the miracle the Lord performed in parting the waters of the Red Sea to enable the "ransomed" children of Israel to safely pass through, while the pursuing Egyptians were destroyed. (Exodus 14:21-31.) In verse 15, the Lord affirmatively responds to the question raised in this verse.
